stimulusHtml:
General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a governmental policy response to the technological changes depicted in the excerpt. The response must include a reference to the policy issue or content in the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how an ideological perspective corresponds to the policy response described in part A. The response must include a reference to the policy issue or content in the scenario.

For Task C, the response must explain how core American values could be affected by technological innovations in the economy.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
